Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Sorry to keep you waiting, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca is already sitting when you turn around.'}
{3: "You came to this tiny bar in Babylonia's commercial district at Bianca's invitation. According to your terminal, this place isn't exactly an easy one to find."}
{3: "Fortunately, the instructions Bianca left you with were spot on: take a left from the cinema's main entrance, and you'll see the sign at the third alley."}

{3: 'The rectangular space only fits a bar counter, with large instruments like a cello, guitar, and djembe placed in the corners. Every inch of this small area is meticulously designed and arranged.'}
{2: 'I got here a little early.', 3: '10'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Happy Birthday.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca still looks a little apologetic as she pulls out a bottle of wine from her bag and hands it to the bartender.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I tried making sparkling wine for you. Had to spend quite some time learning it... and I hope you like it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'When the bartender pops the champagne cork, the rich bubbles within make a pleasant sound.'}
{3: 'With glasses clinked, the sweet wine and the tastes of all sorts of fruits quickly spread across your mouth.'}
{2: "I'm really enjoying it.", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I passed by an abandoned vineyard a few months ago and saw some grapes there on my way back from a mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'So I started looking for fruits that are still growing on Earth and made this bottle of sparkling wine with them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Another glass, please.', 3: '20'}
{2: 'By the way, how did you know about this place?', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '"Third alley to the left of the cinema entrance."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I've always wanted to come here after movies to see performances by musicians from WGAA. They are probably the freest souls of our time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I find that kind of freedom out of reach, but it gives me a reason to keep fighting.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'So I was wondering if... Oh, speak of the devil!', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Look at the door where Bianca is pointing)', 3: '26'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: 'Leila, the usual?'}
{2: 'Leila', 3: 'You bet.'}
{3: '"Leila" the bartender takes out four glasses and a bottle of whiskey. The three walk to the corner filled with instruments and pick up their gear.'}

{3: "After a simple tuning, the cello started playing first, its deep and heavy tone initiating their impromptu performance. Leila pulls out a small piano from under the barâ€”and that's when it hits you that the fourth glass is meant for herself."}
{3: "Bianca's legs start swaying to the jazz tune as she breaks into a smile without knowing it herself."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Commandant, I want to rebuild that vineyard when everything is over.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca looks at her wine glass and then at you.'}
{2: "So you're thinking about becoming the owner of the vineyard?", 3: '36'}
{2: "Doesn't really sound like something you'd do.", 3: '37'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Hard to picture that, no? Well, I actually want to build a school there.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Bianca', 3: "And when I'm done... the kids will have a childhood totally different from ours. There has to be a garden, that's for sure, and the classrooms can be a little spacious, and...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'There has to be music, too, right?', 3: '40'}
{3: 'Bianca nods with a smile, her legs stopping their rhythmic movement as she delves into her imagination.'}
{2: "I'd love to pay your school a visit when it's done.", 3: '42'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Yup, I'll make sure to invite you when it is.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your glasses clink again. With the wine in your system, you find yourself tapping your fingers to the beat and rhythm.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'And there will always be a room for you there.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Both your and Bianca's glasses are empty when the performance comes to an end with a piano solo."}
